EmailTemplate.name: Welcome Nurture 2018.2 - Technical - Microsite and Contact Us
EmailTemplate.subject: Check out this microsite with curated content
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We understand that sometimes there are just too many videos, white papers, ebooks, etc. to wade through. So, we put a handful of our most popular assets on this microsite <[[https://content.pivotal.io/content-developers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-2&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]> that we thought you’d be interested in. Feel free to peruse at your leisure!
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link-2&utm_campaign=nurture-technical-2018]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103.
